title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy view does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens.
OB: When I select a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choose the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: When I select a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choose the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, the Javadoc for the selected field should be added.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view
2. Select a field in the view
3. Right-click on the selected field
4. From the context menu, choose the 'Add Javadoc' option
